title: Cloud Infrastructure Automation
description: Developed a fully automated cloud infrastructure using Terraform and AWS, enabling rapid deployment of resources.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Implementation
description: Implemented a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker, streamlining the deployment process and reducing time to production.

title: Monitoring and Logging Solution
description: Created a comprehensive monitoring and logging solution using Prometheus and Grafana, improving system reliability and performance.

title: Serverless Application Development
description: Built a serverless application using AWS Lambda and API Gateway, reducing operational costs and improving scalability.

title: Kubernetes Cluster Setup
description: Set up a Kubernetes cluster on Google Cloud Platform, enabling container orchestration and management for microservices.
